page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: The Youth Club has attracted people all over Cotgrave to go to a selection of activities such as discos,summer schools,wedding receptions and break-dancing.There is a snack bar and a snooker table.The tennis courts are owned by the youth club.There are three discos every week one for under 15's and two for the over 15's.At the summer school,you can do lots of things such as puppet making,kite making,swimming,listen to stories and visits to places.Last year we went to Gullivers Kingdom in Derbyshire.Near the end of the summer school,we have a Sports Day.
